m_szDocTitle: AN IMPROVED DOCKING STATION FOR A PERSONAL TRANSPORTER - ALCATEL LUCENT
m_szDocSumamry: AN IMPROVED DOCKING STATION FOR A PERSONAL TRANSPORTER WIPO Patent Application WO/2011/154395 A1 Abstract: The present invention is directed to a docking station for a personal transporter (PT), said PT having a PT control logic for converting PT manipulations into PT control signals, said docking station comprising an interface for connecting the PT control logic to an external computer and for converting PT control signals into application control signals suitable for controlling software applications and/or software services.
